279 Harvard St. (at Beacon St.) • 617-566-6660

Introducing the Kidsmith Reviewers

A group of our local and most avid readers, we meet twice a month to talk about books, write about books, and share our latest favorites. Keep your eyes open for the recommendations in the kids section and discover what our local kids are crazy about!


<div dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-0467b54d-7804-629e-089b-cc4b8c1f0007" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Aidan</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Walking Dead Series</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Robert Kirkman</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">A series straight out of your worst nightmares. Amazing!</div>


<div dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-09cc57cf-7810-410c-30f6-2e5e83d58653" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Dragonball</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Akira Toriyama</div>
A hilarious manga full of explosions and all out ka-me-ha-me-has. A must read!

<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Jude</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Skink No Surrender</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Carl Hiaasen</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Pub Date:  Sept. 23 2014</div>
This book will leave you in suspense and you will never know what is coming next. The characters are great, fun, and you can easily put yourself in their shoes.
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Hugo</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Skink No Surrender</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Carl Hiaasen </div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Pub Date: Sept. 23 2014 </div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">I really enjoyed Skink No Surrender because the characters were really silly and the plot is awesome!</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;"></div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Freddy</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Loki’s Wolves: Blackwell Pages book 1</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: K L Armstrong and M A Marr </div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Like Percy Jackson reborn, mythology meets modern day and a teenage boy must stop the end of the world. Full of action and humor.</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
</div><div dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-09cc57cf-7810-c8c7-509a-1c108dadabaa" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Half Bad</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Sally Green</div>
If you like fantasy this is the book for you. It can be dark at times so its not for the faint hearted. Imagine your dad was Voldemort and your mom is Glinda, would you be respected? Would you be treated like your dad or your mom? The answers are in Half Bad.


<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Will</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Dreamwood</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Heather Mackey</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Pub Date: June 6 2014</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Set in the past where they can barely afford electrical lamps…</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Just Read It!</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: I Am Number Four</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Pittacus Lore</div>
Exciting aliens vs. aliens fantasy in the modern world. I can’t wait until August when the fifth book comes out!
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
</div><div dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-09cc57cf-7811-eaa9-aed5-dc3f48d2ce3a" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Evan:</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: The Drowned Cities</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Paolo Bacigalupi</div>
The half man from Shipbreaker teams up with a lost orphan looking for her friend. After this the Drowned Cities will never be the same.

<div dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-09cc57cf-7812-28e5-dcb8-5a6dc2df7a81" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center;">Sebastian:</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: The Thickety: A Path Begins</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: J A White</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">    </div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">LIke a combination of the Lord of the Rings and The Witch of Blackbird Pond, this book draws you in and doesn’t let you out until you have made it to the ending; and then you are just waiting for the sequel to come out.</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Title: Wildwood</div><div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.15; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">Author: Colin Meloy</div>
Similar to the Golden Compass and Narnia, this novel takes you and doesn’t let you out of its word filled embrace until you have read from the beginning of the first book through the 1500 pages of the whole story.
